scenarios.title: Greetings and Introductions
scenarios.description: Learn essential Arabic greetings and how to introduce yourself in various social situations.
scenarios.culturalContext: Arabic greetings often include religious phrases and vary by time of day and formality level.
learningGoals: Master basic greetings like السلام عليكم
Learn to ask and answer 'How are you?'
Practice introducing yourself with name and origin

scenarios.title: At the Mosque
scenarios.description: Practice respectful communication in mosque settings, from asking for prayer times to seeking guidance.
scenarios.culturalContext: Mosques are sacred spaces requiring respectful language and behavior. Lower your voice and use Islamic greetings.

scenarios.title: Shopping at the Souk
scenarios.description: Navigate traditional markets, ask for prices, and practice polite negotiation in Arabic.
scenarios.culturalContext: Bargaining is expected in traditional souks. Use polite phrases and show respect while negotiating.
learningGoals: Learn numbers and prices in Arabic

scenarios.title: Ordering at a Restaurant
scenarios.description: Order food, ask about menu items, and handle restaurant interactions confidently.
scenarios.culturalContext: Arabic cuisine varies by region. Be aware of halal requirements and traditional meal customs.
keyPhrases: الحساب من فضلك - Al-hisab min fadlak

scenarios.title: At the Airport
scenarios.description: Handle airport procedures, from check-in to customs, using formal Arabic.
scenarios.culturalContext: Airport staff expect formal language. Be prepared with travel documents and use respectful terms.

scenarios.title: Hotel Check-in
scenarios.description: Check into hotels, request services, and handle accommodation needs in Arabic.
scenarios.culturalContext: Hotels in Arabic countries offer varying levels of formality. Adjust your language accordingly.
keyPhrases: هل يوجد واي فاي؟ - Hal yujad wifi?

scenarios.title: Doctor's Visit
scenarios.description: Describe symptoms, understand medical advice, and communicate health concerns.
scenarios.culturalContext: Medical terminology can be complex. Be prepared to describe symptoms clearly and ask for clarification.

scenarios.title: At School
scenarios.description: Practice classroom interactions, ask questions, and discuss academic topics.
scenarios.culturalContext: Educational settings in Arabic countries emphasize respect for teachers and formal language.

scenarios.title: Family Gathering
scenarios.description: Engage in family conversations, discuss relationships, and use kinship terms correctly.
scenarios.culturalContext: Family is central in Arabic culture. Use proper kinship terms and show respect to elders.

scenarios.title: Discussing Weather
scenarios.description: Talk about weather conditions, seasons, and climate in everyday conversations.
scenarios.culturalContext: Weather talk is a common icebreaker. Different regions have varying climates to discuss.

scenarios.title: Asking for Directions
scenarios.description: Navigate cities by asking for and giving directions in Arabic.
scenarios.culturalContext: Arabs are generally helpful with directions. Use polite phrases and be prepared for detailed explanations.

scenarios.title: Phone Conversation
scenarios.description: Handle phone calls professionally, take messages, and schedule appointments.
scenarios.culturalContext: Phone etiquette varies. Start with greetings and state your purpose clearly.
keyPhrases: انتظر من فضلك - Intazir min fadlak

scenarios.title: Job Interview
scenarios.description: Prepare for job interviews with professional Arabic conversation skills.
scenarios.culturalContext: Professionalism and respect are paramount. Use formal language and emphasize qualifications.
keyPhrases: ما هو الراتب؟ - Ma huwa ar-ratib?

scenarios.title: At the Bank
scenarios.description: Handle banking transactions, open accounts, and discuss financial matters.
scenarios.culturalContext: Islamic banking principles may apply. Be clear about transaction types and requirements.
keyPhrases: أريد فتح حساب - Ureed fath hisab

scenarios.title: Post Office
scenarios.description: Send letters and packages, buy stamps, and handle postal services.
scenarios.culturalContext: Post offices offer various services. Be clear about delivery speed and destination.
keyPhrases: أريد إرسال رسالة - Ureed irsal risala

scenarios.title: Public Transportation
scenarios.description: Use buses, trains, and taxis effectively with Arabic communication.
scenarios.culturalContext: Transport systems vary by country. Always confirm prices before boarding taxis.

scenarios.title: Emergency Situations
scenarios.description: Handle emergencies by calling for help and explaining urgent situations.
scenarios.culturalContext: Emergency numbers vary by country (often 999 or 112). Stay calm and speak clearly.

scenarios.title: Hajj and Umrah
scenarios.description: Navigate the pilgrimage with essential Arabic phrases and religious vocabulary.
scenarios.culturalContext: Pilgrimage is a deeply spiritual journey. Use respectful religious language and help fellow pilgrims.
keyPhrases: لبيك اللهم لبيك - Labbayka Allahumma labbayk

scenarios.title: Ramadan Greetings
scenarios.description: Exchange Ramadan greetings and discuss fasting and iftar plans.
scenarios.culturalContext: Ramadan is the holy month of fasting. Use special greetings and be mindful of those fasting.

scenarios.title: Eid Celebrations
scenarios.description: Celebrate Eid with proper greetings and festive conversations.
scenarios.culturalContext: Eid is a joyous celebration after Ramadan or during Hajj. Exchange gifts and share meals.
keyPhrases: كل عام وأنتم بخير - Kul 'am wa antum bi-khayr
تقبل الله منا ومنكم - Taqabbal Allah minna wa minkum

scenarios.title: Wedding Ceremony
scenarios.description: Participate in wedding celebrations with appropriate greetings and conversations.
scenarios.culturalContext: Weddings are elaborate celebrations. Men and women may celebrate separately in some cultures.
keyPhrases: الله يبارك فيكم - Allah yubarik fikum

scenarios.title: Funeral and Condolences
scenarios.description: Express condolences and participate in funeral rites with respectful language.
scenarios.culturalContext: Funerals are solemn occasions. Use quiet, respectful language and offer support to the bereaved.
keyPhrases: إنا لله وإنا إليه راجعون - Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raji'un
البقية في حياتك - Al-baqiya fi hayatak

scenarios.title: Daily Prayers
scenarios.description: Discuss prayer times, prepare for salah, and coordinate with prayer schedules.
scenarios.culturalContext: Five daily prayers are fundamental to Islamic practice. Respect prayer times and mosque etiquette.
keyPhrases: متى صلاة الظهر؟ - Mata salat adh-dhuhr?
حان وقت الصلاة - Han waqt as-salah
